source_item.name: Lesser Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

spells.description: Use: Gain 4,549 Parry and 3,234 Avoidance for 6 sec, after which you emit a shockwave in front of you that deals 79,763 Physical damage. (30 Sec Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a very high chance to lash out with a Hateful Strike, inflicting 164,582 Physical damage to an enemy and healing you for 9,643. These effects are increased by 100% while you are below 35% health.

Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 8,054 to 9,843 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 298 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
